title: Find the LCD of the Fractions
speech: The LCD of  1 ,  2 over x, , and , fraction, 15 over, x squared,   is  x squared .

title: Clear All Fractions
text: We must multiply each fraction by the LCD. We get $$x^2-2x=15$$
speech: We must multiply each fraction by the LCD. We get , x squared minus 2 x is equal to 15
pacedSpeech: We must multiply each fraction by the LCD. We get  , x squared minus 2 x is equal to 15

title: Solve The Equation
text: $$x^2-2x-15=0$$ becomes $$\left(x-5\right) \left(x+3\right)$$. Our solutions are thus $$x=5$$ and $$x=-3$$
speech: x squared minus 2 x minus 15 is equal to 0  becomes  parentheses x minus 5,  times, parentheses x plus 3,  . Our solutions are thus  x is equal to 5  and  x, is equal to negative 3
